ticket.title: undefined method `human_name' when using proxied models (isolated engine)
ticket.original-body:
I get an `undefined method 'human_name' for #<Class:0xb6a599b4>` when i write `MyEngineNamespace::MyModelName.human_name` into a view. For example:
@@@ erb <%= link_to Food::Soup.human_name, soup_path(soup) %> @@@
There's no more info in the error message

ticket.original-body-html:
I get an undefined method 'human_name' for #<Class:0xb6a599b4>
when i write MyEngineNamespace::MyModelName.human_name into a view. For example:

<%= link_to Food::Soup.human_name, soup_path(soup) %>

There's no more info in the error message

version.title: undefined method `human_name' when using proxied models (isolated engine)

version.body: There is no method named human_name for models - it won't also work on plain Rails model in standard application.
version.body-html: There is no method named human_name for models - it won't also work on plain Rails model in standard application.
version.title: undefined method `human_name' when using proxied models (isolated engine)
